reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 295/00: TELEGRAPH AND TELEPHONE COMPANIES
reg_info.act_under: Provincial Land Tax Act   Loi sur l’impôt foncier provincial

content.content: 1. For the purposes of subsection 11 (4.1) of the Act (rate of tax), the following percentages are prescribed for the years indicated: 1. For 2000, 3 per cent. 2. For 2001, 2 per cent. 3. For 2002, 1 per cent. 4. For 2003 and subsequent years, 0 per cent.  O. Reg. 295/00, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. For the purposes of subsection 11 (4.1) of the Act (rate of tax), the following percentages are prescribed for the years indicated:

1. For 2000, 3 per cent.

2. For 2001, 2 per cent.

3. For 2002, 1 per cent.

4. For 2003 and subsequent years, 0 per cent.  O. Reg. 295/00, s. 1.
